META_DESCRIPTION: Voluntary Vixens is a podcast offering a unique and female perspective into society, culture, and politics from a voluntary point of view. Jessie and Maddie want to tear down the barriers to freedom by keeping the discussion sane, peaceful and most importantly voluntary.
